name: On Betrayal
description:
**Recommended full screen! 

The founder of the largest pharmaceutical company in the world is a homicidally anxious woman. Eighteen years ago, she made an unsuccessful attempt to drug and murder the baby born as heir to rival company LEON. Paranoid, she adopted a son of her own. She called him Atlas Anemone and fashioned him into a killing machine, anticipating the day Theo Leon would come for AnePharma. 

She was always an impatient woman. 

In a secluded school deep in the forests of Northern Ireland, you’re about to meet the boy whom your mother warned you about your entire life. Under the guise of an olive branch in the form of a martial arts instructional retreat, you’re tasked with uncovering the mystery of LEON’s heir. Befriend him, fight him, figure out what makes him the monster your mother insists he is. 

“Watch the eyes, Atlas.”
